articles.author: Drew Friedman
articles.title: OPM seeks early-career talent for ‘Tech Force’ federal hiring initiative - Federal News Network
articles.description: OPM's new federal hiring initiative to surge early-career tech talent comes after the loss of over 300,000 employees from government this year.
articles.content:
The Office of Personnel Management is seeking to bring a surge of technical expertise into the governments ranks, as part of a new federal hiring initiative called the U.S. Tech Force.
The effort fr… [+5839 chars]

articles.title: 8 Rare Vintage Tech Products Worth Thousands That Might Be Hiding In Your Attic - bgr.com
articles.description: Collectible tech is a lot newer than most other kinds of vintage items, which might take hundreds of years to become interesting. Nostalgia plays a big part.
articles.content: Although they don't fetch the high sums that analog watches from major luxury brands do, some digital watches are surprisingly collectible. Casio was a major pioneer in digital watches, so it's no su… [+1473 chars]
